definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
to spike the ball (volleyball etc)/to smash (tennis etc)
(idiom) to freely air one's views/to be heard far and wide/to attract a lot of attention
When you enter a country, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
to make a concession/to be accommodating
to whisper to one another's ear
lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
